data.title: Sidekick Gaming Mental Health Journals
data.meta_description: Firesprite are committed to wellbeing, equality, diversity, inclusion and belonging, and are proud partners of Safe In Our World Level Up Mental Health and Ukie Raise The Game.
data.text:
Special delivery for our sprites

This week, we were delighted to send these spectacular Safe In Our World Sidekick Journals out to our sprites!

The Video Games Mental Health Journal by our friends Safe In Our World is packed with practical mindfulness techniques and gaming-inspired mental health prompts to nourish creativity and promote wellness. It‚Äôs been lovingly crafted to be the perfect ‚Äòsidekick‚Äô for any gamer.

Safe in our World is a video games mental health charity on a mission to foster worldwide mental health awareness within the video game industry. The charity has a vision of ‚Äúa global games industry where every business treats mental health with equal importance and respect, and everyone feels they can speak out‚Äù and ‚Äúa world where video game communities are free from prejudice and stigma, where every player feels safe.‚Äù

Firesprite became a Level Up Mental Health partner in 2021, and we‚Äôre thrilled to support the invaluable work that Safe In Our World do to promote mental wellbeing throughout the industry. We absolutely love our new Sidekicks! üíñ

If you‚Äôd like to know more about the exceptional work, support and resources provided by Safe In Our World or learn more about how you can support or raise funds for their mission, visit their website here.
